Producer: Marta Ramírez, Fernando Riera, Manuel Monzón
Synopsis: Irene is a woman in her thirties with a four-year-old daughter who has just separated from her husband and cannot find her place in the world. Determined to get by at whatever cost, she flees to a remote village in the mountains to try to rebuild her life, with the help of the lush vegetation, omnipresent nature and legends around her there.
Title: The Enchanted
